name: TWIN LOGIC ON BEHALF OF COMPETITIVE CARRIERS ASSOCIATION
description: Association of rural and reginal wireless carriers and stakeholders
sampleDescriptions:
Issues relating to the Universal Service Fund, including High Cost Fund Connect America Fund, Mobility Fund, the Lifeline Program.
Issues relating to federal spectrum
Issues relating to the IP transit

Issues related to intellectual property including: patent litigation reform, cell phone unlocking/DMCA copyright office triennial review, copyright office reform modernization, section 512 of the DMCA
Issues relating to privacy, including the FCC ISP privacy rules; issues relating to cybersecurity, encryption, autonomous vehicles, internet of things.
Reforms to the Electronic Communications Privacy Act; encryption
